The Mithril sword is a sword stronger than the black sword. It requires 20 Attack to wield.

Players can make this sword at level 54 Smithing by using one mithril bar and a hammer on an anvil, granting 50 experience. It can also be purchased from the Varrock Swordshop.

[[File:Mithril sword detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''Mithril sword''' is a [[sword]] stronger than the [[black sword]]. It requires 20 [[Attack]] to wield.

Players can make this sword at level 54 [[Smithing]] by using one [[mithril bar]] and a [[hammer]] on an [[anvil]], granting 50 experience. It can also be purchased from the [[Varrock Swordshop]].
